content: in pattern starting with round 1 pm pick up 1 extra stitch in the ladder of the row below between the heel flap and the leg of the sock pick up 14 16 18 stitches along the side of the heel flap knit to the bor marker you will now begin decreasing until you are back to your original number of stitches 4 round 1 work instep stitches in pattern sm k1 ssk knit to the last 3 stitches k2tog k1 round 2 work instep stitches in pattern sm k to bor marker repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you are back to your original stitch count then repeat round 2 until the foot of your sock measures approximately 2 inches shorter than your desired length end on round 4 of the pattern break mc toe join cc round 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before marker k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before marker k2tog k1 round 2 knit all stitches repeat rounds 1 and 2 six more times repeat round 1 until 16 stitches remain finish with kitchener stitch weave in your ends and your sock is complete 5
